headline: Halliburton & Its Partner Launch NEX Lab to Advance Energy Innovation
summary: HAL teams with A*STAR to launch Singapore's S$35 million NEX Lab, fast-tracking well completion innovation and advancing low-carbon energy technologies.

headline: Oil: I've Never Been More Bullish On Energy
